title: [Large-Scale] Simulation-Based Language Literacy Education to Strengthen Information Fluency

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital information retrieval skills and job-related language usage experience
context.additional_context: Program focusing on information evaluation, integration, and ethical application in a virtual environment reflecting real-world work scenarios

learning_goals: Learners will evaluate the credibility of job-related information with over 80% accuracy in a VR simulation environment.
Through simulation tasks, learners will demonstrate the ability to compare and integrate information from at least three sources.
Learners will apply information ethics principles (copyright, citation, etc.) with 100% compliance in project deliverables.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
